definitions.definition: An odd, puzzling or absurd person or thing.
One who questions or interrogates; a prying person.
A competition in the answering of questions .
examples: We came second in the pub quiz .

definitions.definition: A school examination of less importance, or of greater brevity, than others given in the same course.

main_definition: ( dated ) An odd, puzzling or absurd person or thing.
secondary_definitions: ( dated ) One who questions or interrogates; a prying person.
A competition in the answering of questions .
( education ) A school examination of less importance, or of greater brevity, than others given in the same course.
